Click HERE to opt in for Loot!
Step 1: Follow the link, then drag & drop your selections into the opt-in window.
Step 2: Rank your selections by preference.
Step 3: SAVE (For the love of Elune, save your changes!)
Winners will be randomly selected and notified via email.
Prizes can be picked up from the LOOT DEPOT during listed operating hours.
If you have questions, please email xyz@blizzard.com
